item.title: Visit Houston Texas | Travel Guide for Tourist Attractions
item.description: Discover top places to visit in Houston! Find amazing tourist spots and plan your perfect Texas getaway. Uncover HTX today!

item.title: Things To Do in Houston, TX | Events, Shopping & Nightlife
item.description: Discover the best things to do in Houston, TX, from exciting events and shopping to vibrant nightlife and entertainment.

item.title: Houston TX Trip Planner | Your Guide to Travel & Vacations
item.description: Start planning your Houston getaway! Discover essential travel info, maps, itineraries, and tips for an unforgettable Texas experience.

item.title: Houston History & Timeline - Houston Visitors Bureau
item.description: Discover Houston's history from its founders to present times. Find facts, timeline, community and culture from the official Houston visitors bureau.

item.title: Houston Attractions | Top Tourist Spots & Local Activities
item.description: Uncover the best places to visit in Houston! Explore parks, landmarks, unique sights, and museums. Plan your HTX adventure now!

item.title: About Houston, Texas | Community, Culture & Neighborhoods
item.description: See for yourself, here in Houston, where much of daily life happens outdoors, thanks to mild, year-round temperatures. Take time to explore the eclectic, culture-filled neighborhoods, gallery spaces and attractions, which offer diverse flavors that can only be found here.

item.title: Houston Facts & Figures | Find Population, Culture & Industry Data
item.description: Hollywood directors frequently film in Houston because of the vastly diverse terrain and unique locations found in the Greater Houston area, from the urban landscape seen in Jason’s Lyric and Reality Bites to the NASA favorites Apollo 13, Armageddon and Space Cowboys.

item.title: Houston Digital Visitor Guide | Request Travel Tips & Info
item.description: Get Houston, Texas’ Digital Tourist Guide! Submit your info to access itineraries, travel tips, deals, & everything you need for your trip.

item.title: Houston, Texas Trip Ideas | Travel & Vacation Itineraries
item.description: Plan your Houston escape! Discover top experiences, itineraries, and hidden gems for couples, families, solo travelers, and first-timers.

item.title: Houston Restaurant Weeks 2025
item.description: As the fourth-largest city in the country, Houston is home to more than 70 countries and regions represented in its restaurants. During this month-long event, diners can experience a curated taste of that diversity while also supporting a great cause.
